subtests.name: script.setHTML should fail.
iframe.setHTML should fail.
object.setHTML should fail.
div.setHTML should pass.

Sanitizer:
.setHTML("Hello", ...) obeys parse context.

Sanitizer:
.setHTML("data", ...) obeys parse context.
